snippet: A Washington Post reporter and two other journalists detained last month are being held over “security issues,” Iran’s judiciary spokesman said Monday, offering the first official indication of why they are being held.
abstract: Iran's judiciary spokesman says Washington Post reporter Jason Rezaian, his wife Yeganeh Salehi and another photojournalist are being held over 'security issues.'
lead_paragraph: A Washington Post reporter and two other journalists detained last month are being held over “security issues,” Iran’s judiciary spokesman said Monday, offering the first official indication of why they are being held.

headline.main: Iran: ‘Security Issues’ Cited in Detention of 3 Journalists
headline.print_headline: Iran: ‘Security Issues’ Cited in Detention of 3 Journalists
